price: (60) Except his wife." We [i.e., Allāh] decreed that she is of those who remain behind.[679]
arabic: إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَآ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: [679]- For having collaborated with the evildoers.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnā innahā lamina al-ghābirīna
